trans-unit.source: The source of the event, the <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" />.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理 <see cref="E:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted" /> 之 <see cref="T:System.Messaging.MessageQueue" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventHandler> 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates how to create an event delegate (<xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventHandler>) for the event handler (`MyReceiveCompleted`) and associate it with the <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例說明如何建立事件委派 (<xref:System.Messaging.ReceiveCompletedEventHandler>) 事件處理常式 (`MyReceiveCompleted`) 並與<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueue.ReceiveCompleted?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives a message from a queue, and writes its label to the screen.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式會接收來自佇列的訊息，並將其標籤寫入螢幕。
